description: We are a team of experienced media buyers with expertise in Search Arbitrage, Leadgen, Finance, and more. Right now, we're looking for a strong Media Buyer (FB + TikTok, Search Arbitrage) who knows how to build profitable ad campaigns and scale them to consistent results.
responsibilities: Full-cycle ad buying in FB and TikTok: from launch to scaling
Testing and selecting creatives (together with designers and using spy tools)
Researching and validating new offer hypotheses

requirements: 1+ year of hands-on experience with FB and TikTok

Comfortable testing and cutting non-performing creatives
Team player willing to share insights and knowledge
offer: Base rate from $500 + % of profit (real earnings $4,000+ with strong results)
Remote work with a flexible schedule
Relocation opportunity to Cyprus
